name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mass friend request or send req Deletor 2024

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete all friend request or send friend request in simple clicks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download the Extension
( Watch the video how the extension exactly works )
Note: Change your Language to English (US)
1- Click on the extension icon
2- Follow the "1st Step" to load your chat list
4- Follow the "2nd Step"
5- Click the button (Start Request Deletion)
    (You Can Also stop request Deletion)
6- Enjoy!
